[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@secured-finance/stablecoin-lib-base](./stablecoin-lib-base.md) &gt; [Decimal](./stablecoin-lib-base.decimal.md)

## Decimal class

Fixed-point decimal bignumber with 18 digits of precision.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Decimal 
```

## Remarks

Used by libraries to precisely represent native currency (e.g. Ether), DebtToken and ProtocolToken amounts, as well as derived metrics like collateral ratios.
